name: Manning River Aero Club
about: Manning River Aero Club, established in 1960, is a renowned flying school and club located at Taree Airport on the Mid-North Coast of New South Wales. We offer comprehensive flight training programs for various licences, including the Recreational Pilot Licence (RPL), Private Pilot Licence (PPL), and Commercial Pilot Licence (CPL), as well as Night VFR Rating and design feature endorsements. Our training is conducted in a Cessna 172, with flexible scheduling to meet individual needs. The club also provides scenic flight programs highlighting the Barrington Coast and offers trial introductory flights for new students. With a dedicated team and modern facilities, we ensure a supportive and professional environment for all aspiring pilots. Join us to embark on your aviation journey.
